charges.charge_description: 18:1341, 2(b) Mail fraud, causing an act to be done. (1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: It is adj that the dft shall pay to the U S a total fine of $5,000.00 conc on each ct. Purs to the sentg reform act of 1984, it is adj that the dft shall make restitution to the following aggrieved party in the following amounts: Prudential-Bache, 127 John St., 11th Flr, New York, NY 10292, Attn: J. P. Wilson-$5, 000, $5,000 (Ct 2), $8,000 (Ct 3), $6,897.50 (Ct 4). Purs to teh sentg reform act of 1984, it is fur adj that the dft is hereby comm to cnts 1-4 to the cust of the BOP tob e impris for a term of 18 mos. This term consists of 18 mos on each of cts 1-4 of the indict, to be served conc. Upon rel frm impis, the dft shall be placed on sup rel for a term of 3 yrs on cnts 1-4, conc on each ct, and under the following t &; c: 1. the dft shall comply w/the r &; r of the USPO and G O 318, 2. the dft shall pay any restitution imposed by this jgm and that remains unpaid at the commenmnt fo the term of community supervision, as dir by the P/O and 3. as dir by the P/O, the dft shall provide to the P/O an accurate financial stmnt, w/supporting documentation, as to all sources and amts of income and all expenses of the dft. In addition, the dft shall provide fed and st income tax returns as req by the P/O. It is ORD that the dft pay a S/A of $200 ($50 per ct) to teh U S purs to 18 USC 3013. It is fur ORD that the exeuction fo sent is stayed until 5/26/92 at which tim e the dft shall surr to the designated facility of the bop or if no designation made, to the USM. (1-4)
